mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_pw, user_nickname, user_age, user_address, user_social) value (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNickname}, #{userAge}, #{userAddress}, #{userSocial});
mapper.update: update user set user_pw = #{userPw}, user_nickname = #{userNickname}, user_age = #{userAge}, user_address = #{userAddress} where user_id = #{userId} and user_refresh_token = #{userRefreshToken} ;
mapper.insert: insert into mail (user_id, auth_key, delete_date) value (#{userId}, #{authKey}, now());
mapper.delete: delete from user where user_id = #{userId} and user_refresh_token = #{userRefreshToken} ;
